alert.note: Alert for Jones (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 9:56AM CST until January 11 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Tallahala Creek At Laurel affecting Jones County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tallahala Creek at Laurel. * WHEN...Until Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 13 feet, Agricultural and lowland flooding is becoming more widespread along and near the creek. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM CST Tuesday the stage was 2.8 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river will rise to a crest near flood stage around midday Wednesday. - Flood stage is 13 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Tallahala Creek Laurel 13.0 2.8 Tue 8 am CST 13.0 10.3 7.7 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening.this evening at 1000 PM CST.
